LongDescription:
Listen to the beautiful melody of Zelda on your Apple TV!			

A twist from the original tweak WiivampTV, ZeldaTV gives you the theme songs from Nintendo’s best-selling game Zelda: Ocarina of Time.

Toggles in the settings are used to turn on/off themes for each app. Just respring and you’re set!

This project is open sourced and complies with the MIT license. https://github.com/joshblah555/wiivamp 
                                                               
Enjoy!
         
Any questions? Follow JTV @Joshblah555


**ChangeLog**

Ver 1.6

- Tweak has been re-wrote and redesigned from the ground up.
- Improvements to respringing.
- Music toggling should function effectively.
- Applications are grouped and concise.

Ver 1.3

- Drastically minimized package size (from 140MB to ~20MB)
- Changed music file extensions from .m4a to .mp3
- Added backr00m
- Fixed nitoTV song
- Renamed files to prevent crashing.

Ver 1.2

- Minor bug fixes
- Changed song titles to approperiate processes
- Changed toggle order

Ver 1.1

- Added more toggles:
Chimera/ElectraTV
ReProvision
Pong
Screen Saver

- Changed “Apply Settings” to “Respring” inside preference loader. 


Ver 1.0
 
- Initial Release
- Changed NitoTV toggle to nitoTV
- Changed AppStore toggle to App Store
